text: Michael Gage (May 1, 1945 â€“ August 23, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the California State Assembly for the 8th district from December 6, 1976 to November 30, 1980. Gage was born in Glendale, California. Gage died on August 23, 2021 in Salem, Oregon from cancer, aged 76. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Oregon Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Glendale, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Michael Gage (politician)
